name: Human
description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races. They are innovators, achievers, and pioneers. Humans are known for their diversity, ambition, and drive, often striving to conquer and explore new frontiers. They build sprawling cities, establish vast kingdoms, and are capable of great ingenuity and resilience.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.
special: Versatile: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.
